[img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/logow.png[/img] Media [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [img]http://i554.photobucket.com/albums/jj409/xxxglitcherxxx/Screenshot_7.png[/img]
*Ill show more as the days pass* Info: - Dicing - Pm logs - Chat logs - Commands logs - Vote store - Curse prayer - Players shop - Donator island - All Tzhaar waves - Custom quest tab - Bank slots fixed - Vote4Cash system - Money pouch fixed - 317 Gameframe fixed - Multiple custom item - Custom ranks + crowns - Clan chat + Lootshare - Donator Credits system - Ingame item spawner GUI - Staff interface options - Created summoning system - Perfect skillcape emotes - All 25 skill work perfectly - Perfect combat + perfect PVP - Dungeoneering & Pk'ing skills - Skillcape shop with no more lag - Quest cape require all stats 99 - Christmas craker system opening - Loyalty titles system color fixed - Donator cape gives 1.5x more experiences *Much more*
